TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TouchRunner extends MonoTouch.NUnit.UI.BaseTouchRunner

Docs.summary: The TouchRunner type is the main class for Touch.Unit. With a few settings it will create it's own UI and can start (by user input or automatically) executing all unit tests that were added to the runner's instance.

remarks.para: By default all logs will be displayed on the console, i.e. they will be shown in MonoDevelop's Application Output pad.
Logs can also be sent to a network server, e.g. for automated testing.
